text:
- [Narrator] AWS Data
Exchange makes it easy
to find, subscribe to, and use third party
data products in the cloud.
Gain a 360-degree view of your customers,
and identify high value prospects,
with AWS Data Exchange, to optimize
marketing effectiveness and personalize

customer experiences across
channels and touchpoints.

Choose from a diverse selection
of audience data sets,
ranging from demographic, socioeconomic,
transactional, and behavioral data,
to construct precise segmentation

empowering richer, more
relevant customer experiences,
and more accurate predictions.

From ShareThis's consumer
behavior and interest data
to Infutor's total consumer insights API,

find hundreds of data
sets that you can analyze
with a wide variety of AWS analytics
and machine learning services.
You can also access these data sets
through various delivery methods,
including file-based delivery in S3,

query-in-place in Amazon
Redshift, or third party APIs.

Numerous data providers
offer flexible trials,

so you can evaluate the
data before you buy.
Learn more, and get started today.
(upbeat music)
